article_title: If Obama Vetos Bill Increasing Defense Spending, Military Paychecks Would Be Affected
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: The administration has threatened a veto of any bill that increases defense spending without corresponding increases in non-defense spending.
